comment: Hes so great to have as a studio professor. He really cares about his students and makes sure they are well taken care of. He lets people have their own ideas and but will always steer you into the right direction. Would definitely take again.

Lectures the whole time but lets class out early everytime. attendance is mandatory (4 freebies). not a lot of homework. final was confusing as the sheet contradicted what he wanted (probably department's fault as everything was uniform with the other intro classes). good for a class like intro
Professor Young is soft-spoken and has a Jamaican accent, but is very easy-going and lets you have freedom in your designs. He will give you good feedback if you ask questions and put in the effort.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria
